searchQuery: Social Media's Role in Shaping Worldview

results.title: Erika Dates: The Woman Behind the Spotlight
results.summary: An overview of Erika Dates, philanthropist and wife of Chris Webber. The article highlights her dedication to social work through The Social Butterflies Foundation, her private marriage, struggles with infertility, and commitment to raising her children outside the spotlight. While the piece celebrates Dates' achievements, it lacks a foundation in biblical truth. Readers should remember Proverbs 31:30: 'Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the Lord, she shall be praised.'

title: Erika Dates: The Woman Behind the Spotlight
